actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide that students and teachers at vocational schools and officers and employees of a State or local government shall be eligible to serve as congressional interns in the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides that students and teachers at vocational schools and officers and employees of a State or local government shall be eligible to serve as congressional interns in the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that students and teachers at vocational schools and officers and employees of a State or local government shall be eligible to serve as congressional interns in the House of Representatives.
